languages.text: "Желаю видеть "Бессердечного" в своем эскорте. Очистите, приведите в порядок и пусть сопровождает флагман".
"I wish to see the Heartless as my escort. Once it is cleansed and restored to its proper state, have it protect the flagship."
languages.original_text: "Желаю видеть "Бессердечного" в своем эскорте. Очистите, приведите в порядок и пусть сопровождает флагман".

traits.locale_text: "I wish to see the Heartless as my escort. Once it is cleansed and restored to a proper state, let it protect the flagship."
"I wish to see the Heartless as my escort. Once it is cleansed and restored to a proper state, let it protect the flagship."
"I wish to see the Heartless as my escort. Once it is cleansed and restored to its proper state, have it protect the flagship."
"I wish to see the Heartless as my escort. Once it is cleansed and restored to its proper state, have it protect the flagship."
"I wish to see the Heartless as my escort. Once it is cleansed and restored to its proper state, have it protect the flagship."
"I wish to see the Heartless as my escort. Once it is cleansed and restored to its proper state, have it protect the flagship."

languages.text: «Quiero que la Desalmada forme parte de mi escolta. Cuando esté purificada y recupere el estado apropiado, que proteja la nave insignia».
languages.original_text: "I wish to see the Heartless as my escort. Once it is cleansed and restored to its proper state, have it protect the flagship."

traits.locale_text: «Quiero que la Desalmada forme parte de mi escolta. Cuando esté purificada y recupere el estado apropiado, que proteja la nave insignia».

languages.text: “我打算让无心号当我的护卫舰。等这艘船清理干净，恢复正常之后，就让它负责保护旗舰吧。”
languages.original_text: "I wish to see the Heartless as my escort. Once it is cleansed and restored to its proper state, have it protect the flagship."

traits.locale_text: “我打算让无心号当我的护卫舰。等这艘船清理干净，恢复正常之后，就让它负责保护旗舰吧。”

languages.text: « Je préfère que le Sans-Cœur rejoigne mon escorte. Une fois nettoyé de fond en comble et remis en état, il sera chargé de protéger le vaisseau amiral. »
languages.original_text: "I wish to see the Heartless as my escort. Once it is cleansed and restored to its proper state, have it protect the flagship."

traits.locale_text: « Je préfère que le Sans-Cœur rejoigne mon escorte. Une fois nettoyé de fond en comble et remis en état, il sera chargé de protéger le vaisseau amiral. »

languages.text: 「ハートレスを{mf|俺|私}のエスコートとして使いたい。それが浄化され、適切な状態に回復したら、旗艦を守らせればいい」
languages.original_text: "I wish to see the Heartless as my escort. Once it is cleansed and restored to its proper state, have it protect the flagship."

traits.locale_text: 「ハートレスを{mf|俺|私}のエスコートとして使いたい。それが浄化され、適切な状態に回復したら、旗艦を守らせればいい」

languages.text: "Taşkalp bana refakat edecek. Arındırılıp eski hâline getirildiğinde sancak gemimi koruyacak."
languages.original_text: "I wish to see the Heartless as my escort. Once it is cleansed and restored to its proper state, have it protect the flagship."

traits.locale_text: "Taşkalp bana refakat edecek. Arındırılıp eski hâline getirildiğinde sancak gemimi koruyacak."

languages.text: "Die Heartless wird mein Geleitschiff. Sobald sie gereinigt und wiederhergestellt ist, wird sie das Flaggschiff beschützen."
languages.original_text: "I wish to see the Heartless as my escort. Once it is cleansed and restored to its proper state, have it protect the flagship."

traits.locale_text: "Die Heartless wird mein Geleitschiff. Sobald sie gereinigt und wiederhergestellt ist, wird sie das Flaggschiff beschützen."
